categories: Category:Articles known by rank or affiliation

nodes.text: The Earl of Vis was a male individual associated with the city of Vis on the planet Naboo. A historical figure of the planet, he was the cousin of one of its ancient kings. The earl built a large banquet rotunda in Theed, the capital of Naboo, and owned a castle in the planet's Western Reaches. He was also the ancestor of Ars Veruna, a king of Naboo who resided in the earl's castle after abdicating in 33 BBY.

The Earl of Vis was first mentioned in the 2000 reference book Inside the Worlds of Star Wars: Episode I, written by Kristin Lund. Set during Queen Amidala's reign, the book established that the earl was cousin to "the old king," implying a family connection with King Veruna, the ruler who preceeded Amidala. However, the 2009 The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia and James Luceno's 2012 novel Darth Plagueis established that the earl was cousin to an ancient king, with the latter specifying that he was an ancestor of Veruna.
